meanings.definition: To work, write, or study diligently, especially late at night.
meanings.sent1: She lucubrates on her homework until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent2: He lucubrates on his novel every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: The owl lucubrates on its hunting skills under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The dedicated student lucubrates on mastering new vocabulary.
meanings.sent5: The flickering candlelight illuminates the room where she lucubrates on her research.

meanings.sent1: The professor lucubrates on various academic papers throughout the year.
meanings.sent2: The author lucubrates on historical events to write her next book.
meanings.sent3: The researcher lucubrates on the mysteries of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent4: His mind lucubrates on the complexities of quantum physics.
meanings.sent5: The artist lucubrates on creating a masterpiece that will stand the test of time.
